books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An inexperienced college student falls in love with a tortured man who has particular sexual tastes; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Tess Gerritsen
books.description: The detective Jane Rizzoli and the medical examiner Maura Isles protect a boy whose family and foster family have all been murdered.
books.name: LAST TO DIE

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Two troubled people develop an intense, obsessive relationship.
books.name: BARED TO YOU

books.author: by Kathy Reichs
books.description: The forensic anthropologist Temperance Brennan pursues a case involving infanticide, murder and corruption; the 15th novel in the series behind the show “Bones.”
books.name: BONES ARE FOREVER

books.author: by Louise Penny
books.description: Chief Inspector Armand Gamache of the Sûreté du Québec investigates a murder at a remote abbey.
books.name: THE BEAUTIFUL MYSTERY

books.author: by Eloisa James
books.description: Theodora Saxby discovers that James Ryburn, heir to the Duchy of Ashbrook, desires her for her dowry.
books.name: THE UGLY DUCHESS

books.author: by Laurann Dohner
books.description: A New Species male falls for the human doctor who is trying to save him; Book 8 in the series.
books.name: OBSIDIAN

books.author: by M. L. Stedman
books.description: An Australian lighthouse keeper and his wife decide to keep a baby who has washed ashore.
books.name: THE LIGHT BETWEEN OCEANS

books.author: by Lene Kaaberbol
books.description: A nurse makes a shocking discovery: a naked and drugged boy hidden in a locker at the Copenhagen train station.
books.name: THE BOY IN THE SUITCASE

books.author: by Emily Giffin
books.description: A woman’s successful life is disrupted by the appearance of an 18-year-old girl with a link to her past.
books.name: WHERE WE BELONG

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A young widow buys a bed-and-breakfast.
books.name: THE INN AT ROSE HARBOR

books.author: by Sherryl Woods
books.description: Mitch, a widower, sees Lynn, a single mother, not only as the girl who got away but as a woman in need of support.
books.name: WHERE AZALEAS BLOOM
